column5: I have a buddy whos looking for a supply of Battery Operated, wireless, door chimes/door bells.  He uses them in a fishing gadget that he makes and needs about 100 for the xmas season...  Hes having a difficut time finding them for a decent price up north here... anyone have any ideas?? or know a shop where they can be purchased??
Home Depot... but I'm pretty sure they will cost you your first born and a spinal fluid sample! HH
Cdn Tire has them as well, they were actually on sale last time I was in there. Not sure if they still are though, that was a few weeks ago.

Here is a couple I dug up...  http://www.eztone.com/battery-operated-chimes.htm  http://www.nutonesales.com/chime.html  http://www.globalsources.com/manufacturers...Bell-Chime.html  http://www1.shopping.com/xPO-Lamson_Lamson...ll~r-1~CLT-INTR  http://electrical.hardwarestore.com/15-57-...ell-605488.aspx   The last one seems to  be the cheapest  Gerritt.
Just found this!!!  http://www.princessauto.com/_osn.cfm?CTRY=...;T1=DOOR%20BELL  cant beat Princess Auto and they are CDN!! only 12 bux  Gerritt.
